insert into friendships (id, userId, friendId, displayName, message, status, region, phone, description, imageUri, timestamp, createdAt, updatedAt) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.friendId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.imageUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.timestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
on duplicate key update id = values(id), userId = values(userId), friendId = values(friendId), displayName = values(displayName), message = values(message), status = values(status), region = values(region), phone = values(phone), description = values(description), imageUri = values(imageUri), timestamp = values(timestamp), createdAt = values(createdAt), updatedAt = values(updatedAt)
